title: WooCommerce Payment Completed Event
description: Schema used by AI to handle actions when a WooCommerce order payment is completed.

orderId.description: Unique identifier for the WooCommerce order associated with the completed payment.

paymentDetails.description: Detailed information about the completed payment.

amount.description: Total amount charged for the payment.

currency.description: Currency code for the payment (e.g., USD, EUR, BDT).

paymentMethod.description: The method used for the payment.

transactionId.description: Unique identifier for the payment transaction.

customerDetails.description: Basic information about the customer who made the payment.

actions.description: Follow-up actions to take based on the payment completion.

sendEmailToCustomer.description: Whether to send a confirmation email to the customer.

notifyAdmin.description: Whether to notify the admin about the completed payment.

emailContent.description: Prepared email contents for each recipient.

customerEmail.description: Content of the email to send to the customer.

adminEmail.description: Content of the email to send to the admin.

supplierEmail.description: Content of the email to send to the supplier.

shopManagerEmail.description: Content of the email to send to the shop manager.
